name: InpharmD
0: ”Alexa, ask infarm d. to send me a report on the treatments of corona virus”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: infarm d.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask any clinical question, receive a custom literature summary. You will need an account on inpharmd.com to use this skill. You will be asked to link your InpharmD account with your Alexa account. Once you ask a question, the InpharmD team will upload their answer so you can view them in your InpharmD account.

DISCLAIMER :
The InpharmD Skill is specially designed for medical professionals to use on their own personal Alexa device. Decisions regarding drug therapy must be based on the independent judgment of the clinician and are subject to changing information about a drug (e.g., as reflected in the literature and manufacturer's most current product information) and changing medical practices.
